Uses of Interface
com.j2bugzilla.base.BugzillaMethod

  • Packages that use BugzillaMethod 
    Package Description
    com.j2bugzilla.base
    This package contains the base classes required by the library to communicate with a Bugzilla installation.
    com.j2bugzilla.rpc
    This package groups all of the remote procedure calls provided by the J2Bugzilla API.

    • Uses of BugzillaMethod in com.j2bugzilla.base

      Methods in com.j2bugzilla.base with parameters of type BugzillaMethod 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void BugzillaConnector.executeMethod(BugzillaMethod method)
      Allows the API to execute any properly encoded XML-RPC method.

    • Uses of BugzillaMethod in com.j2bugzilla.rpc

      Classes in com.j2bugzilla.rpc that implement BugzillaMethod 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AddAttachment
      The AddAttachment class allows clients to post new attachments to existing Bugs, with an optional descriptive comment.
      class  BugComments
      This class allows clients to request a list of all public Comments made on a specific Bug in a Bugzilla installation.
      class  BugSearch
      This class provides convenience methods for searching for Bugs on your installation.
      class  BugzillaVersion
      The BugzillaVersion class allows clients to query a particular Bugzilla installation as to its version.
      class  CommentBug
      The CommentBug class allows clients to add a new comment to an existing Bug in a Bugzilla installation.
      class  GetAccessibleProducts
      The GetAccessibleProducts class allows clients to access the set of Products which can be searched against or have bugs entered against them for the current user.
      class  GetAttachments
      The GetAttachments class allows clients to retrieve Attachment objects from existing Bugs within a Bugzilla installation.
      class  GetBug
      Allows users to retrieve a specific bug for which the ID is already known
      class  GetLegalValues
      The GetLegalValues class allows clients to query their installation for information on the allowed values for fields in bug reports, which may be edited to be installation-specific.
      class  GetProduct
      The GetProduct class provides access to information on Products active in a particular Bugzilla installation.
      class  LogIn
      The LogIn class allows a client to authenticate as a specific user with a specific Bugzilla installation.
      class  LogOut
      The LogOut class allows clients to log out of a Bugzilla installation they have previously authenticated with using LogIn.
      class  ReportBug
      This class allows clients to report a new Bug to a Bugzilla installation.
      class  UpdateBug
      The UpdateBug class allows clients to update an existing Bug on the installation with new values.
